summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CAPTURE PWA - Multiplayer DB, UI Fixes & Metric Cleanup. All 8 features verified working correctly.
seed_data_creation: None required - brand territories are hardcoded in GameContext.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified working. Territory claim endpoint tested. Multi-user territories visible on map (7 user territories + 7 brand territories = 21 polygons total).

signup_button_styling.details: Sign Up button has WHITE background (rgb(255, 255, 255)) and BLACK text (rgb(0, 0, 0))

scratch_card_clean_logo.details: Scratch card shows ONLY brand logo - no 'SCRATCH ME!' text or emojis. Logo loads via proxy for CORS.

profile_stats_no_area.details: Profile page shows 3-column stats grid: Territories, km Distance, Total Time - NO Area metric

territory_popup_no_area.details: Territory popup shows distance/time (e.g., '0.00 km â€¢ 0:00 min') instead of area

multi_user_territories_visible.details: All 7 territories from database visible on map (from multiple users: test_user_1, test_user_2, anonymous, etc.)

territory_claim_api.details: /api/territories/{id}/claim endpoint works - updates user_id and color, stores previous_owner

new_territories_saved_to_mongodb.details: POST /api/territories creates new territory in MongoDB with all required fields

other_users_territories_visible.details: Map displays 21 territory polygons (7 brand + 7 user territories from DB + local)

mocked_apis.authentication: User login/signup is MOCKED - any email/password works
